boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Anniversary Edition
boardgame.description: To celebrate the fifty-year anniversary of Avalon Hill, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies is launching its most expansive game ever. The Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Anniversary Edition features the debut of Italy as the third Axis nation, the introduction of the cruiser unit to the naval line-up, and the largest Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies board to-date measuring 24x46 inches. With over 600 pieces, players will be able to recreate and decide the outcome of WWII like never before. The Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Anniversary Edition is designed and developed by Larry Harris, the original designer of Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Avalon Hill (AVH 86620) Spring 1941, The World is at War! Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies celebrates 50 years of Avalon Hill games with this Anniversary Edition of the classic World War II strategy board game. Designed by Larry Harris, A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition will utilize the standard D6 combat system found in Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Revised, Europe, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Pacific. Italy will debut as the third Axis nation, China will be operated by the US player, and cruiser class ships will join the naval line-up for the first time. The largest board ever produced for an A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A game, along with deluxe components will ensure this is the granddaddy of all Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies board games. Deploy your forces and prepare for battle! Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Anniversary Edition details: Designed by Larry Harris, creator of Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Italy introduced as the third Axis nation Two set-up options: Spring 1941 and Spring 1942 Cruiser class ships join the naval unit line-up China included as US controlled ally New sculpts for Italy, China, and others Game board measures ~ 24” x 46” Over 600 game pieces 48 page rulebook

Available and Shipping on November 18, 2008 Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies celebrates 50 years of Avalon Hill games with this Anniversary Edition of the classic World War II strategy board game. Designed by Larry Harris, A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition will utilize the standard D6 combat system found in Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Revised, Europe, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Pacific. Italy will debut as the third Axis nation, China will be operated by the US player, and cruiser class ships will join the naval line-up for the first time. The largest board ever produced for an A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A game, along with deluxe components will ensure this is the granddaddy of all Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies board games. Deploy your forces and prepare for battle! Hi, I have opened the game, but not fully played it. BUT...I have added various NEW areas to the game board ( that were missing eg. like Malaysia where the UK should start in 1941 ! ) and some pacific islands. ALSO i have altered the set-up cards...BONUS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; I have added approximately 150 other miniatures eg. Landing craft, other tanks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; twin-engined aircraft. All at the right scale ( from otyher games ). The rule book is a mess, but you could get another ( download ? ). I would much PREFER if you could come _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; collect _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; pay _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; then you could see the whole package. Note that postage in the UK would be £11..abroad impossible..due to its weight

Axis and Allies Anniversary Edition is an outstanding game. With over 600 pieces, units from 7 different nations, and alternate setups for 1941 and 1942; this game is amazing! Many believe it to be the best Axis and Allies game yet. Plus, since it is a limited edition, it shouldn’t depreciate in value much - especially if you treat it well. But why buy a new version for $500 that will depreciate $200+ just by opening it? This game is meant to be played, so get it and play it. Since this is a used game, you probably want to know what you are getting. I have counted everything including the IPCs (damage markers, researchers, VCs). All of the original components (or exact equivalents in the case of dice and grey/red chips) are present except two: a black dice and a UK fighter. The replacement black dice is not as rounded in the corners (most likely from another A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A game). The replacement UK fighter is from AA42. It is the same color and almost identical (It is the same size but it is slightly thinner and the wings don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have the slight upward curve of the AA50 ones) Now we get to quality/wear. The plastic pieces are in good condition (one Italian artillery is slightly bent). The charts and IPCs are in good condition. Very little wear on the boards as well. They have even been cleaned a bit since the pictures. The box top has very little wear - some whitening in the corners. Three of the bottom corners show some more significant wear (see pictures) one of which is very slightly indented (not very much at all - you can hardly notice it on the pictures). Pictures can be found at http://profile.imageshack.us/user/pyoung20/ Shipping will be roughly $20. I will be out of town from the 26th - 1st so I will not be able to respond to any offers at that time (I might be able to check it on the 30th since I will be back for a short part of that day, but I am not sure).

Just PM me with any questions, posting up alot of my collection so have a look at my other games.
